name: Check validate for maxlenth Name

testSteps.description: Given I navigate to the login page

children.description: Is home page: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), http://testmaster.vn/admin

testSteps.description: When I submit username and password

children.description: Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=email]], khanh.tx@live.com

Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=password]], abc123
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: div.login-form button.btn-login]

testSteps.description: Then I should be logged in
Given I staying create News Page

children.description: Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> xpath: //ul[2]/li[4]/a/span]

testSteps.description: When I provied valid Group and valid subject and valid body and invalid name

children.description: Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: button#ddlGroup]
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> xpath: //div[3]/div/ul/li/a]
Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: input#txtSubject], Thư mời

Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: div.note-editable.panel-body], Tham dự hội thảo
Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: input#txtName], 123457890........100
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (85ba95e61ea5347e8d4f1601578662e6)] -> css selector: button.btn.btn-sm.btn-primary.btn-next]

testSteps.description: Then I should see messenger "This not exceeds 100 characters " field Name
